Membership & Benefits
Joining the SDG!
An opportunity
The continued advancement and support of the Swarm Simulation System is of fundamental importance to the established Swarm user community as well as prospective users. The accessibility of this package has been and continues to be key to the researchers in many fields whose simulations are modeled using Swarm. As a member of the Swarm Development Group, you directly contribute to the availability, continued enhancement and support of the Swarm Simulation System. The SDG is the only and most effective support mechanism for the Swarm package.
Constituency
The estimated number of users of Swarm ranges from 300 to 500 persons, including small and large companies, both public and private institutions, universities, government, laboratories, and individuals.
Membership duration
All memberships are one year in duration starting the date of subscription.
